name: A Fool's Errand
description:
In A Fool's Errand , after technology destroyed the world, there must be a chosen one to bring back the world's lost knowledge. 

 YOU are the second character in an average story, not Chad the Chosen One.

Chad the Chosen One is the Chosen One. He’s special.

Now you must be the chosen one's personal assistant and just make sure  he doesn't get into too much trouble. 

Good luck, NOT Chosen One.
